segments.text: I'm struck by the children's teamwork; it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is doing the risky climbing, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to receive her prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, in perfect anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've clearly planned this little cookie heist together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable, in a mischievous way, but also so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to give way any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward, they seem oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt over some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea what is happening just meters away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret mission is certainly underway.
segments.speaker: PAR
